snippet.title: Frostpunk: On The Edge | Official Teaser
snippet.description:
Be sure to visit the On The Edge's store page here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1147010 and add it to your Steam Wishlist! 

"They say the snow is dead. But we've learnt to the contrary."
Samuel Robinson, Frostland Scout (1887, New London).

On The Edge — the third and final expansion from Frostpunk’s Season Pass — is set after the vicious Great Storm as the expedition is sent from New London with a special assignment. On The Edge not only opens a brand new chapter set in the Frostpunk universe but also further enriches the core experience by pitting players against new challenges, and offering new unique mechanics both in the city and on the Frostland map.

A brand new, frozen board is set and the pieces are moving. What destiny lies ahead for your people? What will this mean for you as their leader? Shape the future of humanity in a defining moment in Frostpunk's universe.

On The Edge on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1147010

Frostpunk: On The Edge is coming to Steam this summer and will feature:
- A brand new story scenario, set after the Great Storm
- An array of challenges to overcome on a new, desolate map
- Unique mechanics to utilize on the Frostland view

#OnTheEdge #Frostpunk #SocietySurvival #Expansion
